sentences.en: Adoption papers were duly filed in May 1974.
sentences.cn: 有关收养的文件在1974年5月就已归档.

sentences.en: Duly mete out rewards and punishments.
Enclosed is our contract No. 345 in duplicate, of which please return us one copy, duly countersign.
sentences.cn: 随函附上我方第345号合同一式两分, 请会签并回寄一份.

sentences.en: Farfrae duly received the request to discontinue attentions to Elizabeth - Jane.
sentences.cn: 伐尔伏雷当然收到了那封请他同伊丽莎白 ― 杰恩断绝来往的信.

sentences.en: Here are your travel documents, all duly signed.
sentences.cn: 这是你的旅行证件，都签好了。

sentences.en: Huck was silent while he framed a duly cautious reply.
sentences.cn: 哈克没作声,心里却在精心编造,好回答他提出的问题.

sentences.en: I shall duly pay you back.
Lily was duly impressed by the magnitude of her opportunities.
sentences.cn: 选择良偶的重要性丽莉早已深深地铭刻在心.

sentences.en: Process for their appearance has been duly issued.
sentences.cn: 要他们出庭的传票已及时发出.

sentences.en: Rice production duly expanded, greatly facilitated, it was thought, by subsidized credit.
sentences.cn: 曾经有一种观点, 补贴信贷会极大地促进大米生产, 使其充分发展.

sentences.en: The document was duly signed by the inspector.
sentences.cn: 这份文件已由检查员签妥。

sentences.en: The Foreign Office was duly consulted , and gave its nihil obstat.
sentences.cn: 外交部经请示后予以核准.

sentences.en: The TMI plant was duly constructed.
sentences.cn: 三哩岛核电厂按时批准兴建.
他们按时参加了我们的会议.

sentences.en: Your letter is duly to hand.

trans.tran_en: in the proper or expected way
